title: Marbits and a Mayo Knife
description: It's time to clear the docket! Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn discuss the proper way to eat Lucky Charms, communal baked goods, adding berries to pancakes, ordering the same entrée as your dining partner, and proper knife placement. Plus much more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
